title: Behind The Idea #2: Papa Don't Preach
description: John Schnatter, the eponymous Chairman of Papa John's, stepped into the political quagmire of NFL players kneeling during the National Anthem, and subsequently stepped down from the CEO role. An opportunity for investors? Seeking Alpha's Behind the Idea looks at Akram's Razor's case for Papa John's to go private - https://seekingalpha.com/article/4139703-papa-johns-time-order-takeout.
